sentences.en: A clear description of role and responsibilities of the wholesaler.
sentences.cn: 明确描述批发商的角色和职责.

sentences.en: Develop a picture of our performance with each wholesaler, primarily availability.
sentences.cn: 发展每个批发商对我们的表现描述, 主要是铺货率.

sentences.en: Farther down the road is the Fu Zhong hardware and furniture wholesaler.
sentences.cn: 沿路更远一点是福中五金家具批发店.

sentences.en: I & E and Wholesaler in fresh veg & fruits.
sentences.cn: 蔬菜水果 进出口 及 批发商.

sentences.en: Identify the CSS capabilities and capacities of each wholesaler.
sentences.cn: 确认每个批发商的CSS能力和能量.

sentences.en: Our standard unit price to the wholesaler is 23.5.
sentences.cn: 我们给批发商的标准单价是23.5.

sentences.en: These are used to create profiles for each wholesaler.
sentences.cn: 这是他日常的工作或通过与批发商的正式会谈.

sentences.en: Under state law, bar owners must buy their liquor from wholesalers.
sentences.cn: 依照州法律，酒吧经营者们必须从批发商们那儿购买酒。

sentences.en: We are an importer and wholesaler of laces in Japan.
sentences.cn: 我们是一家进口商、批发商的鞋带.

sentences.en: We are an international wholesaler company specializing in health spa devices.
sentences.cn: 我们是一家国际化的批发商,公司专门从事健康水疗设备.

sentences.en: We are importer and wholesaler of wrapped V Belt. Please contact us.
sentences.cn: 我们是一家采购商. 请生产汽车皮带的厂家与我们联系.

sentences.en: We inform you that we have commenced a business as a wholesaler.
sentences.cn: 我们已开始经营批发业务,特此通知.

sentences.en: We're the largest furniture wholesaler in Illinois.
sentences.cn: 我们是伊利诺伊州最大的家具批发商。

sentences.en: Welcome the trading company and wholesaler contact with us!
sentences.cn: 欢迎各贸易公司与我们合作,对于大的订单,价格可再议!

sentences.en: Wholesaler Are Especially Welcomed And We Will Give Special Discounts.
sentences.cn: 批发商都特别欢迎,我们将给予特别折扣.

sentences.en: Wholesaler's prominent reputation may result in positive carryover effects on allied'retailers.
sentences.cn: 因此,直指消费者市场,塑造强势形象,可能是批发商因应竞争环境所做的策略性突破.

trans.tran_en: a person or company who sells goods wholesale
